title: People With Certain Medical Conditions And Covid-19 Risk Factors
content:
Primary immunodeficiency
Talk with your healthcare provider about what additional precautions may be necessary. Additionally, people who are
moderately or severely immunocompromised
may benefit from additional doses of updated COVID-19 vaccine. Because their immune response following COVID-19 vaccination may differ, specific guidance has been developed.
